item.name: File read bytes per second
item.description: Full counter name: \System\File Read Bytes/sec 磁盘读取量 （Bytes/sec）

item.name: File write bytes per second
item.description: Full counter name: \System\File Write Bytes/sec 磁盘写入量 （Bytes/sec）

item.name: Average disk read queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Read Queue Length 表示磁盘读取请求的平均数

item.name: Average disk write queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Write Queue Length 表示磁盘写入请求的平均数

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Windows service discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of Windows services of different types as defined in global regular expressions "Windows service names for discovery" and "Windows service startup states for discovery".

trigger_prototype.name: Service "{#SERVICE.NAME}" ({#SERVICE.DISPLAYNAME}) is not running (startup type {#SERVICE.STARTUPNAME}) on {HOST.NAME}

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

item_prototype.name: Disk Time of {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 指所选磁盘驱动器忙于为读或写入请求提供服务所用的时间的百分比。 正常值<10，此值过大表示耗费太多时间来访问磁盘，可考虑增加内存、更换更快的硬盘、优化读写数据的算法。若数值持续超过80 (此时处理器及网络连接并没有饱和)，则可能是内存泄漏。

item_prototype.name: Disk Bytes/sec of {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 显示了磁盘上的总的数据传输量，单位为Bytes/sec。

item_prototype.name: Disk Read Bytes/secof {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 显示了磁盘上读数据的传输量。（单位为Bytes/sec）

item_prototype.name: Disk Reads/sec of of {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 显示了磁盘每秒的读IO数量。

item_prototype.name: Disk Transfers/sec of {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 显示了磁盘上的IOPS总数，直观的显示了说对应LUN上的每秒IO的吞吐量。

item_prototype.name: Disk Write Bytes/secof {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 显示了磁盘上写数据的传输量。（单位为Bytes/sec）

item_prototype.name: Disk Writes/sec of {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: 显示了磁盘每秒的写IO数量。

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 10% on volume {#FSNAME} of {HOST.NAME}
Free disk space is less than 20% on volume {#FSNAME} of {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: Lack of available virtual memory on server {HOST.NAME}
Lack of free memory on server {HOST.NAME}
Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}
